name: Heimwald
description:
This is the first Version, the "Alpha", of my Hobby-Project "Heimwald". You play a Magican, travel the World, learn Spells, defeat evil Enemies and collect Money and Items.

Please consider, that i do not see the Game as "finished" in this Version. It is a Game in Develomenet and far from beeing complete. Bugs can appear.

Gameplay
As a Magican in a new World you walk around, discorver the Land, meet new People, learn Speels or trade with them. After you have learned your first Spell you can enter a Dungeon to fight Enemies and Level up your Character. With Talentpoints earned with Levelups you can customize the Developement of your Skills. The Story is only in the Beginning yet and there is no End in Sight.
